results.title: Cardiac and vascular beta-adrenoceptor-mediated responses before and during treatment with bisoprolol or atenolol.
results.text_hl: Equieffective cardiac @<m>DISEASE_beta_Thalassemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017086 @@@beta-@@@blockade with @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was associated with a lesser degree of vascular beta-adrenoceptor blockade during treatment with the more cardioselective beta-blocker @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Bolli P, Müller FB, Linder L, Ji BH, Bühler FR. Cardiac and vascular beta-adrenoceptor-mediated responses before and during treatment with bisoprolol or atenolol. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1986;8 Suppl 11():S61-4. PMID: 2439800
